text.text: How can I create a facility record while working on a claim in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a new facility record, click Create a new facility on the Incident details tab. Then, enter the facility information and click Save.

text.text: What options do I have to add or find a facility during claim creation?

text: You can add or find a facility on the Incident details tab during claim creation or on the Claim page. To add a facility, you can: On the navigation bar, hover over Claims and select New claim. On the first page, enter the service date and patient information. Click Next.

text.text: How do I create a new facility from the Claim page in ZOLL Billing?

text: To create a new facility from the Claim page, you can: On the navigation bar, click Admin. Click the Billing tile. Click the Facilities tile. You will see a list of configured facilities. Click on a facility name to modify the facility information.

text.text: Can I add a facility directly from the Facilities page?

text: Yes, you can add a facility directly from the Facilities page. To add a facility, you can: On the navigation bar, click Facilities. On the Facilities page, click Add a facility.

text.text: What steps are involved in enabling or disabling a facility in ZOLL Billing?

text: To enable or disable a facility, you can: 1. Click Facilities on the navigation bar. 2. Look for the Enable column. 3. Click the enable icon to disable the facility. 4. Click the disable icon to enable the facility. A disabled facility remains in the system but can no longer be searched, assigned to a claim, or used in a transaction.

text.text: How do I delete a facility from the system in Zoll Billing?

text: To delete a facility from the system, you can: 1. Click Facilities on the navigation bar. 2. Click the name of the facility you want to delete. 3. Click Delete. 4. Click OK to confirm the deletion.

text.text: Is there a way to import a list of facilities into ZOLL Billing?

text: Yes, you can import a list of facilities into ZOLL Billing. To import a list of facilities, you can: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. On the Facilities page, click Upload facilities. 3. On the "Upload facilities file" window, click Choose File and navigate to the file's location. 4. Click the file and then click Upload. 5. When the status bar completes, click Import.

text.text: What is the process for creating an import file for facilities in ZOLL Billing?

text:
The process for creating an import file for facilities in ZOLL Billing is as follows:

1. Open the Facilities page.
2. Click the Import facilities link.
3. On the "Upload facilities file" window, click Choose File and navigate to the file's location.
4. Click the file and then click Upload.
5. When the status bar completes, click Import.

The import file must be a comma-separated values (CSV) file. The file must contain the following columns:

* Facility ID
* Facility name
* Facility address
* Facility city
* Facility state
* Facility zip code
* Facility phone number
* Facility fax number
* Facility email address

The facility ID is a unique identifier for the facility. The facility name is the name of the facility. The facility address is the address of the facility. The facility city is the city where the facility is located. The facility state is the state where

text.text: How do I verify the NPI with the NPPES NPI Registry while importing facilities?

text: To verify the NPI with the NPPES NPI Registry while importing facilities, you can: 1. Click to verify the NPI with the NPPES NPI Registry. 2. Scroll down to the bottom and view duplicate records within your file. 3. When you are ready, click Import.

text.text: What options do I have to review and modify facility data before importing?

text: You can review and modify facility data before importing by clicking the "Facility details" tab. You can also edit the facility information by clicking the "Edit" button.

text.text: Can I export a facility list from ZOLL Billing?

text: Yes, you can export a facility list from ZOLL Billing. To export a facility list, you can: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. On the Facilities page, click Export facilities. 3. On the "Export facilities file" window, click Choose File and navigate to the file's location. 4. Click the file and then click Export.

text.text: Where can I find the option to export all facilities in ZOLL Billing?

text: To export all facilities in ZOLL Billing, you can: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. On the Facilities page, click Export all facilities.

text.text: How can I add or find facilities using the Admin section in ZOLL Billing?

text: You can use Admin to build out your facility list. Facilities created in Admin will display in the list when the biller starts typing the facility name. You can also add NEMSIS information here in Admin. To add or find facilities in Admin, you can: 1. On the navigation bar, click Admin. 2. Click the Billing tile. 3. Click the Facilities tile. You will see a list of configured facilities. Click on a facility name to modify the facility information. If you don't see a facility on the list, click Add a facility.

text.text: What is the purpose of adding NEMSIS information in Admin while configuring facilities?

text: You can add NEMSIS information in Admin while configuring facilities. NEMSIS is a national electronic data interchange standard for emergency medical services. It is used to exchange patient information between different organizations.

text.text: How do I create a facility claim

text: To create a facility claim, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, hover over Claims and select Create Claims 2. On the first page, enter information such as the service date, patient name, DOB, sex, address and then click Next 3. On the Patient Details tab, verify the patient information and either find patient insurance or just click Next 4. On the Transport details tab, select the transport type 5. To bill this claim to a facility: a. Click the Facility tile in the Origin and/or Destination box.

text.text: What information do I need to enter when creating a facility claim?

text: When creating a facility claim, you need to enter information such as the service date, patient name, DOB, sex, address and then click Next.

text.text: Can I bill a claim to an existing facility or do I need to create a new one?

text: If you want to bill an existing facility, you can enter the facility name or address and pick the facility from the list. If you don't find the facility, you can click Create a new facility to add one.

text.text: How do I select a facility for billing purposes in ZOLL Billing?

text: To select a facility for billing purposes in ZOLL Billing, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab to view the list of configured facilities 3. Click the facility name to see facility details including open submitted and queued claims 4. You can also see the facility's past invoices and running balance 5. The new charges list can be downloaded to a CSV file by clicking Download CSV

text.text: What actions can I take on the Charges tab while creating a facility claim?

text: You can apply a category to a claim during claim creation, when the claim is suspended, and after the claim was submitted. You can also view and change rates on the Charges tab under Settings.

text.text: How do I queue a facility claim for submission?

text: To queue a facility claim for submission, you can click the "Complete the claim" button on the Charges tab. This will change the claim's status to "Queued for submission - Facility invoice".

text.text: Where can I view a list of all configured facilities in ZOLL Billing?

text: To view a list of all configured facilities in ZOLL Billing, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the All facilities tab.

text.text: How do I access a list of facilities with new charges in ZOLL Billing?

text: To view a list of facilities with new charges in ZOLL Billing, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the With new charges tab.

text.text: What details can I view for a facility with new charges?

text: You can view the following details for a facility with new charges: Open submitted claims, Queued claims, Past invoices, Running balance. You can also download the new charges list to a CSV file by clicking Download CSV.

text.text: How do I download the new charges list to a CSV file?

text: To download the new charges list to a CSV file, you can click Download CSV.

text.text: Where can I find a list of facilities with outstanding balances in ZOLL Billing?

text: To view a list of facilities with outstanding balances in ZOLL Billing, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. Click the With outstanding balances tab.

text.text: What information is available for a facility with outstanding balances?

text: You can view the following details for a facility with outstanding balances: Open submitted claims, Queued claims, Past invoices, Running balance. You can also download the new charges list to a CSV file by clicking Download CSV.

text.text: Can I view past invoices and running balances for a facility in ZOLL Billing?

text: Yes, you can view past invoices and running balances for a facility in ZOLL Billing. To view the facility's past invoices, you can click the Past invoices tab. To view the facility's running balance, you can click the Running Balance tab.

text.text: How do I navigate to the "With new charges" tab on the Facilities page?

text: To view a list of facilities with new charges, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. On the Facilities page, click the With new charges tab. You can click the facility name to see facility details including open submitted and queued claims. You can also see the facility's past invoices and running balance. The new charges list can be downloaded to a CSV file by clicking Download CSV.

text.text: What options are available for managing facility claims in ZOLL Billing?

text: There are many ways to assign or reassign claims in ZOLL Billing. You can take a look at the information below or watch the following video.

text.text: How do I ensure accuracy and completeness while working with facilities?

text: You can ensure accuracy and completeness while working with facilities by previewing the facility invoice. This is a good way to ensure its accuracy and obtain an understanding of the final invoice's appearance.

text.text: how do i create facility?

text: There are several ways to create facilities: - Add a facility record on the fly as you create or work claims - Import a list of facilities from a spreadsheet - Add, edit, and delete facilities on the Facilities page.

text.text: how can i find facility?

text: You can add or find a facility on the "Incident details" tab during claim creation or on the Claim page.

text.text: How to Add or find a facility during claim creation?

text: There are several ways to create facilities: - Add a facility record on the fly as you create or work claims - Import a list of facilities from a spreadsheet - Add, edit, and delete facilities on the Facilities page. You can add or find a facility on the "Incident details" tab during claim creation or on the Claim page.

text.text: How to Add a facility from the Facilities page?

text: To add a facility from the Facilities page, you can click Facilities on the navigation bar and then click Add a facility. You can then enter the required information, such as the facility name, type, NPI, and address. You can also select which child to copy the record to.

text.text: How to enable a facility?

text: To enable a facility, you can click Facilities on the navigation bar and then look for the Enable column. The icons in this column toggle. You can click the enable icon to disable the facility. You can also click the disable icon to enable the facility.

text.text: i want to delete a facility. what should i do?

text: To delete a facility, you can click Facilities on the navigation bar and then click the facility name. You will then see a list of options. Click Delete to delete the facility.

text.text: how to create a imported file?

text:
To create an imported file, you can follow these steps:
1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities.
2. On the Facilities page, click Import.
3. In the Import facilities dialog box, click Browse and select the file you want to import.
4. Click Import.
5. The imported facilities will be displayed on the Facilities page.

text.text: how to Import  bulk facility list?

text:
To import a bulk facility list, you can follow these steps:
1. On the top navigation bar, click Facilities.
2. On the Facilities page, click Upload facilities.
3. A pop-up window displays. Look for the blue link called Example CSV Import File. When you click this link, Excel will open.
4. Leave everything the way it is but delete the example content and then add your own.
5. Save the file with a different name in a place you will remember.

text.text: how to Export a facility list?

text:
To export a facility list, you can follow these steps:
1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities.
2. On the Facilities page, click Export all facilities.

text.text: How to find facilities in Admin?

text:
To find facilities in Admin, you can follow these steps:
1. On the navigation bar, click Admin.
2. Click the Billing tile.
3. Click the Facilities tile.
You will see a list of configured facilities. Click on a facility name to modify the facility information. If you don't see a facility on the list, click Add a facility.

text.text: How to Create a Facility Claim?

text: To create a facility claim, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, hover over Claims and select Create Claims. 2. On the first page, enter information such as the service date, patient name, DOB, sex, address and then click Next. 3. On the Patient Details tab, verify the patient information and either find patient insurance or just click Next. 4. On the Transport details tab, select the transport type. 5. To bill this claim to a facility: a. Click the Facility tile in the Origin and/or Destination box.

text.text: How to View a list of facilities?

text: To view a list of facilities, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities. 2. Click the All facilities tab. 3. Scroll down the list and click the facility name. 4. Click the Contracted charges tab. 5. Click Edit. 6. Click the calculation method field and select the method you want to view.

text.text: How to View a list of facilities with outstanding balances?

text: To view a list of facilities with outstanding balances, you can follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar, click Facilities 2. On the Facilities page, click the With outstanding balances tab. 3. Click the facility name to see facility details including open submitted and queued claims. 4. You can also see the facility's past invoices and running balance.
